      • TRACK_WIDTH

        public static final double TRACK_WIDTH
        Width in meters of the inner (i.e. asphalt) part of the track. This gets mapped to the height range 0..1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNPASSABLE_HEIGHT

        public static final double UNPASSABLE_HEIGHT
        Terrain above this height is unpassable.
